author: John Smith
title: Understanding JavaScript Closures
description: A beginner-friendly guide to closures in JavaScript.
post: Closures allow functions to retain access to their lexical scope, even when executed outside of it. This post explains closures with practical examples.

author: Emma Williams
title: CSS Grid vs Flexbox
description: When to use CSS Grid and when to use Flexbox.
post: CSS Grid and Flexbox are powerful layout tools, but they serve different purposes. Grid is best for two-dimensional layouts, while Flexbox excels in one-dimensional arrangements.
